title: added top and bottom courtyard layers
description: Adds top and bottom courtyard layers to the PCB rendering layers.

title: Fix floating bottom-layer CAD components to correctly align it components with board surface
description: Fixes alignment issue of bottom-layer CAD components with the board surface in the 3D viewer.

title: Force WebGL context loss on OrientationCubeCanvas cleanup to prevent GPU leaks
description: Explicitly calls renderer.forceContextLoss() during unmount to ensure the WebGL context is fully released, preventing GPU memorycontext leaks during remounts or viewer reinitialization.
body:
Explicitly calls renderer.forceContextLoss() during unmount

Ensures the WebGL context is fully released, not just the scene and renderer objects

Prevents GPU memory/context leaks during remounts or viewer reinitialization

Improves stability in long-running sessions and repeated canvas lifecycles

This change tightens resource cleanup and avoids lingering WebGL contexts that renderer.dispose() alone does not fully release.

title: disable autorouting and PCB auto-layout for circuitJson-inflated subcircuits
description: Disables autorouting and PCB auto-layout features for subcircuits that are inflated from circuitJson, preventing automatic layout adjustments in these cases.

title: Add PcbCourtyardRect Support
description: Adds support for the CourtyardRect component in PCB design, allowing for rectangular courtyard areas to be defined in circuit layouts.

title: large panel repro
description: Adds a test for rendering a large panel with multiple boards and verifies the absence of errors in the generated circuit JSON.

title: Support vias in manual `pcbPath` and add square multilayer snapshot
description: Adds support for vias in manual pcbPath routing, allowing layer transitions in traces and ensuring visibility of inner layer traces through a square multilayer snapshot test.
body:
### Motivation
- Manual `pcbPath` routes must support `via: true` and explicit `fromLayer`/`toLayer` so users can place layer transitions (including inner layers) in manual traces. 
- The test should exercise a square-shaped path so `inner1`/`inner2` traces remain visible and are not visually obscured by a top-layer segment.

### Description
- Implemented `via` handling in `Trace_doInitialPcbManualTraceRender.ts` by recognizing `pcbPath` points with `via`, emitting `route_type: "via"` entries, tracking a `currentLayer` and switching it after vias, and emitting subsequent `wire` segments on the correct layer. 
- Insert `pcb_via` records for each `via` using `getViaDiameterDefaults` so hole/pad sizes are populated. 
- Added a `ManualPcbPathPoint` type and accept `pcbPath` entries that are either string selectors or objects with `x`, `y`, optional `via`, `fromLayer`, and `toLayer`. 
- Added a snapshot test `tests/components/primitive-components/trace-pcb-path-vias.test.tsx` and corresponding SVG snapshot that routes a square path across `top`, `inner1`, and `inner2` so inner-layer traces are visible.

### Testing
- Ran `BUN_UPDATE_SNAPSHOTS=1 bun test tests/components/primitive-components/trace-pcb-path-vias.test.tsx` and the test passed (1 pass, 0 fail). 
- Ran `bunx tsc --noEmit` for type-checking and it completed without reporting new errors for the modified code. 
- Ran `bun run format` which completed successfully.

------
[Codex Task](https://chatgpt.com/codex/tasks/task_b_6982e351fa48832e86a85fa21ba0ba5c)

title: Add timeout guidance for DevServer file upserts
description: Adds a centralized helper for file upsert requests and provides actionable timeout guidance for users when uploads to the local file server fail due to timeout errors.
body:
### Motivation
- Provide clearer diagnostics and actionable guidance when uploads to the local file server time out (the stacktrace showed a `TimeoutError` on POST `/api/files/upsert`).

### Description
- Import `TimeoutError` from `ky` and add a centralized `postFileUpsert` helper to route all file upsert requests through a single call site. 
- Replace scattered direct `this.fsKy.post("api/files/upsert", ...)` calls with the new helper in file-change, rename, initial upload, and node_modules upload flows. 
- Add `logFileUpsertTimeout` which detects `TimeoutError` and prints colored, actionable guidance including the local file server URL and suggestions to check dev server startup and port availability. 
- Adjust the helper parameter typing to align with the existing `initiator` usage.

### Testing
- Ran `bunx tsc --noEmit` to typecheck the project and it succeeded. 
- Ran `bun run format` to apply formatting and it completed successfully.

------
[Codex Task](https://chatgpt.com/codex/tasks/task_b_698378ea730c832ebf89073561c6f383)

title: Fix incorrect trace segment layers in multi-layer pcbPath routing by propagating last-known layer and enabling inner-layer KiCad SVG snapshots
description: Fixes layer-assignment bug in KiCad PCB segment export by correctly propagating the last-known layer for trace routing, ensuring segments are assigned to the correct layers and enhancing SVG snapshot generation for inner layers.
body:
This PR fixes a layer-assignment bug when converting trace.route into KiCad PCB segments: if intermediate route points omit layer, segments could be exported onto the wrong layer (or default incorrectly). The converter now derives each segmentâ€™s layer from startPoint.layer ?? endPoint.layer ?? lastKnownLayer, while updating lastKnownLayer as it walks the route, ensuring continuous routing stays on the intended layer across vias and unlabeled points.

Test coverage is expanded with new 4-layer pcbPath via scenarios (Inner1â†’Bottom and Inner1â†’Inner2), asserting vias and expected In1.Cu / In2.Cu / B.Cu segments. Snapshot generation is also updated to include In1.Cu and In2.Cu in KiCad SVG exports, making inner-layer routing visible and preventing false-negative snapshot diffs.
